portfolio.title: Food Mentor
portfolio.description: The goal of this project is to develop a food image analyzer that is based on the dish that the user chooses to upload. That will analyze the food image and then present the ingredient list and a step-by-step making. Providing a straightforward and user-friendly website where users can get what they need without having to go through several websites or videos, assists beginners who are attempting to learn how to cook.
